content: free pattern shadow shawl by antonia shankland all efforts were made to make this pattern error-free for questions or support please email info@fairmountfibers com 5/18/12 © fairmount fibers ltd 2010 not to be reproduced or re-knit for profit page 1 of 2 free pattern size instructions approx 56 across top edge 28 from center back neck with mc cast on 5 stitches knit 2 row join cc to bottom point set up row materials row 1 cc k2 place marker pm yo pm k1 pm yo manos del uruguay serena 50g approx 170 yds 60% baby pm k2 7 sts alpaca 40% pima cotton row 2 cc k2 slip marker sm p1 sm k1 sm p1 sm 2 skeins each mc and cc shown in s2457 tide and s7311 k2 zebra body 32 circular needle us 4/3 75mm or size to obtain row 1 with mc k2 sm yo k to next m yo sm k1 sm yo gauge k to last m yo sm k2 4 sts increased stitch markers row 2 with mc k to end of row slipping markers as you come to them gauge row 3 with cc k2 sm yo k to next m yo sm k1 sm yo 24 sts and 38 row = 4 /10cm in pattern stitch k to last m yo sm k2 4 sts increased row 4 with cc k2 sm p to next m sm k1 sm p to last note m sm k2 4 sts increased shawl is worked in 2-row stripes there s no need to cut yarn at every color change carry color not in use up side repeat row 1-4 until shawl measure 54 across the top of work making sure not to pull it too tight break off cc and continue with mc knit 10 row in garter stitch bind off loosely weave in ends block lightly all efforts were made to make this pattern error-free for questions or support please email info@fairmountfibers com © fairmount fibers ltd 2010 not to be reproduced or re-knit for profit page 2 of 2
